phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Vetto, one of the leaders of the Eye of the Midnight Sun,
Water Creation Magic: Sea God's Hammer!
It did not even faze him.
That is not a bad spell, for a mouse.
Let me give you a reward.
You insects are not even allowed to hold on to hope.
Someone really dangerous just crashed the game.
Due to reasons, I cannot go over there.
Meaning you guys got to do something about him.
All of you, surpass your limits, right here, right now.
Thus, the fate of the Underwater Temple was left in the hands
of Asta and the other Black Bulls.
We will hit him with all the magic we have got!
Combo Magic: Flame Lightning Explosive Cannon!
Even a combo spell that powerful could not scratch him.
The Guy Who Does not Know When to Quit
In the end, you are nothing more than insects.
I gave you the chance to fight back, and this was all you could do.
Good of you to come, boy.
That guy's from the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
I will make you feel the pain Licht felt many times over!
Just like those insects at my feet.
And as their junior, I will take on the duty of bringing you down!
So this is what a slash from the anti-magic sword feels like.
If you were to get a clean hit on me, I probably would not stand a chance.
It definitely had more of an effect than certain-kill spells from most mages.
Then act like you are hurt, you bastard!
Just what are you guys planning to do by gathering those magic stones?
We know you are up to something!
I have no reason to tell you,
a piece of no-magic trash unloved by mana.
You can join the rest of the insects.
This guy's total magic power is on a completely different level.
The magic that flows from him grants constant protection.
I will massacre everyone here, then take my time searching for the magic stone.
I did not forget about the ones outside.
Hopefully the scum out on the frontier can keep me at least mildly entertained.
My family, and those who are just like family to me, live here.
I will never let that happen!
He only grazed us, yet he is still so powerful!
And he is so fast that there is almost no point in reading his ki.
Kiato, I guess you were not going all-out when you were fighting me.
I suppose I cannot expect more from no-magic trash and hick scum.
You sure know how to hurt a guy's feelings, you hairy gorilla.
We will show you what happens when trash and scum get serious!
That bastard's still not fazed one bit.
I can feel it all the way over here...
All of you, surpass your limits, right here, right now.
The captain actually sounded serious for once.
I guess this is not the time for me to be drunk.
If I end up face-to-face with that guy, I am definitely going to die!
On the other hand, if I just hide somewhere, Yami's going to kill me later.
What the hell am I supposed to do?!
I would like a bucket of that pudding, please...
I was about to wrap things up and go see Marie, but now...
Stop getting in the way of my flirting, damn it!
Now that you have run into me,
the most powerful chain magic user in the Eye of the Midnight Sun,
you will never get to see your Marie again.
The hell did you just say?!
Do not think you can get away with saying that!
My chains immediately detect attack magic and strike!
If you are too slow, it will sting ya!
You can dial back that confidence!
My chain will not be able to keep up if there are two targets...
If I only had one, that is!
And I hope you die without leaving a trace behind!
You had me sweating for a second.
To pay you back, I will squish you with these!
There is no point in running, you coward.
That bastard looks and sounds like a weakling, so I thought I would be fine,
As much as it pisses me off,
that bastard's magic is pretty solid for both attack and defense.
The only chance I really have is if he underestimates me.
He already saw my Real Double.
I guess this is all I should have expected from the Black Bulls.
What a worthless group of pathetic losers.
You thought you could use the same trick twice?
in the middle of the battle to turn into Gauche!
but I never thought I would run into you transformed into a crab.
Stop doing weird stuff in my form!
I used up a lot of my magic, but there are more enemies.
We are going to find them and kill them.
I twisted my ankle during that fight back there.
Hurry up and transform into someone that is not me.
Then you will have plenty of legs.
I should not be wasting it, right?
I am pretty sure it was somewhere around here that I saw...
Ah, yes... the only way to eat cake properly is with your hands...
Why the hell is she sleeping?
She was like that when I found her.
Well, anyway, even that glutton can help us fight.
These vines are draining our magic.
It is sucking away my strength!
One of you must be using transformation magic.
Regardless, I was able to catch two this time.
I will make you as useless as this one with my vine magic.
But you guys sure are easy.
I just randomly set my trap magic in various spots
and waited until you morons fell into it.
Now all I have to do is wait for your magic to drain, and then I get to torment you.
Domehead must have been a decoy.
Once you set your fork down, the meal is over...
That jerk, just snoozing away over there...
I do not want to die yet!
Even if I wanted to fight back, Grey can only use transformation magic.
I am just going to have to do something before all my magic gets drained...
We are supposed to be a team!
Then we will be able to fight forever!
I was this close to ending up right back where I started!
We have got a bastard who can only transform and cannot fight,
and a domeheaded glutton who is fast asleep.
Well, are not you a yummy-looking cut of meat...
My vines have already sucked away most of your magic.
It is impossible to defeat me.
I have been wondering this ever since you showed up,
but are not you a bit old to be acting like this?
There is no time to waste!
Somebody is trying to steal your food!
H-How is her magic so immense?
I-I will drain your magic, too!
I have set a trap over there, too!
I hate to admit it, but her attack power is insane.
You can do better, too, cannot you?
I have seen other guys use transformation magic where they transform themselves,
but I have never seen anyone who can transform something else like you.
I think you could probably use that a bit more.
I used up more magic than I thought!
Come to think of it, I have never seen Grey's true form!
Is not he that big guy?
All I can do is stare at Marie's picture.
My angel will help me regain my strength.
H-He really is not looking at Grey.
Oh, so that is what you look like.
I-It is so humiliating to have people see me in my true form!
If I am not transformed, I feel like I will die from the humiliation!
Well, are not you a cute young lady?
And I cannot even deal with the fact that you are the same age as me, Domehead.
I have barely any magic left.
How are things going over there, you hot-headed shrimp?
Did you get your hopes up?
These childish attacks will not work on me!
Prancing around with weapons too good for you...
You do not have a shred of hope.
You are weak against throwing and other long-distance attacks.
Especially with objects that have no magic!
You are weak against those whose physical abilities
are magically reinforced to be greater than yours.
You do not know when to quit!
You actually think that as long as you do not give up,
it will work out somehow, do not you?
That arrogance causes you to keep recklessly attacking opponents you cannot defeat
and makes it easy to mortally wound you.
The idea of trash like you holding the Demon-Slayer Sword and the
You never had any hope of winning.
Looks like your animal hearing was not sharp enough to pick that up.
He said, If I gave up, who could I protect?
Hello, I am Magical Detective Charmy.
A terrible crime has been committed.
To uphold my honor, I will capture this vile criminal!
The criminal was bold enough to go into my room!
But the criminal made a grave mistake.
That is your handprint, is not it?
The ocean's such a lovely restaurant!
I need to hurry up and finish this mission so I can eat those fishies and clams!
Eating all of the ocean's bounty is my magic!
